Blockchain-Expo 2023

This Expo is designed to provide our participants with an interactive and engaging experience featuring keynote plenary panels, concurrent workshop sessions, roundtable discussions, lightning paper sessions, a poster and exhibit hall and much more

ECH-EX Blockchain-Expo 2023

Blockchain-Expo 2023 was decided through the logo competition from May 5th to 25th.

The logo of Tech-ex BlockChain Expo 2023 was decided through the logo competition from April 1 to 20. After online poll and voting process the selection committee selected the logo designed by a youth named Micheal Robs. The logo for this year Expo designed by Micheal looks as below
